remarks: Apply ~ fsumvma for the common case of all numbers less than a real number ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2016.)
statement:
fsumvma2.1 $e |- ( x = ( p ^ k ) -> B = C ) $.
fsumvma2.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fsumvma2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumvma2.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) /\ ( Lam ` x ) = 0 ) ) -> B = 0 ) $.
fsumvma2 $p |- ( ph -> sum_ x e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) B = sum_ p e. ( ( 0 [,] A ) i^i Prime ) sum_ k e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` ( ( log ` A ) / ( log ` p ) ) ) ) C ) $.
$d A k p x $.
$d B k p $.
$d C x $.
$d k p ph x $.
$d k p x $.
$d k x $.
